Luzbel/Attilla::

Luzbel spat fire  and made a ring of fire around Panzer. "We got you 
kitty!!!!" shouted the male while his brother laughted evily


--- In nbwrpg@y..., logomorph@h... wrote:
> DarkMouse::
> She saw the two dragons take off after the big cat. She turned to 
> Galvatron. "You coming?" And with that, she started running after 
the 
> two dragons and the cat.
> 
> 
> Panzer::
> She tried regain her control. Her body wasn't responding like 
normal. 
> Some of her circuits were shorting out and she couldn't see except 
> for blurred images. Everything looked like it was in a supper thick 
> fog.  She turned her head up and sniffed the air. Her audio sensors 
> told her that she was being followed. She could tell it was the 
preds 
> she had encountered moments ago.  She started running again in the 
> oppossite direction.  
> 
> She kept going, not knowing where she was headed.  She knew she was 
> running up hill, then down hill, then back up hill.  Off in the 
> distance, she thought she heard was sounded like thunder. She 
sniffed 
> the air as she ran and could smell the scent of water. A water fall 
> was near by. With luck, she could get tot he bottom of the water 
fall 
> and loose them in the mists. She stayed on her course and hoped 
she'd 
> make it.
